version_description:
Thanks for the continuing feedback, we’re making improvements every day based on your reviews, so please do keep them coming.

In this release we’ve made some changes to make products easier to browse, and allow you to see the Sparks offers you’ve chosen more quickly. 

We’re still working on some great new features, so do keep checking back!

Don’t miss the ‘My M&S’ tab, which allows you to choose the order of the departments you see - just tap More and then Customise to pick what you see first.

We’re also rolling out some changes to make it even easier to choose your Sparks offers.

We’re still working on some great new features, so do keep checking back!

Thanks for the continuing feedback, we’re making improvements every day based on your reviews, so please do keep them coming.

In this release we’ve fixed some bugs. We’re still working on some great new features, so do keep checking back!

In this release we’ve fixed some bugs, and made some changes to make it easier to browse products. We’re still working on some great new features, so do keep checking back!

Thanks for the continuing feedback. We’re making improvements every day based on your reviews, so please do keep them coming.

Thanks for the continuing feedback. We’re making improvements every day based on your reviews, so please do keep them coming.

In this release we’ve fixed some bugs. We’re still working on some great new features, so do keep checking back!

Thanks for all your feedback on our last release, please keep it coming! There’s nothing too exciting in this release, just bug fixes, but we’re working on some great new features for you, so do keep on checking back!
In this release we’ve fixed some bugs. Thanks for all the feedback, please keep it coming.

In this release, we've introduced Apple Pay. This will help you complete your order with ease by using any cards you have setup for Apple Pay.  Visa and MasterCard available initially with Amex being launched at a later date.

Thanks for your continuing feedback - we've recently redesigned the homepage to improve your experience and enhance the overall look and feel of the app.

One new addition is that iPad users will also now be able to use the app in landscape mode!

Please do continue letting us know your thoughts, we're continuously looking to make improvements based off your feedback.

Sparks Bug Fix: We’ve recently fixed an issue that was preventing some users from accessing their Sparks offers.

Product Colour Names: We have also added more information to make it easier for you to choose the right product colour.

Please do continue letting us know your thoughts, we’re continuously looking to make improvements based off your feedback.

Product Images: resolved issue where images were not displaying on certain product pages
Crashes: resolved a number of crashes on product pages
